title: Pixel 5 Bluetooth displays connected to device, but will not allow the selection of the device.
content: My Pixel 5 will connect to a device, but it will not allow me to use that device when using the Android Phone App.  This is an intermittent problem which occurs sometimes when connected to my 2016 BMW 535i and my Pixel Ear Buds (V2).  Please advise :)
